name: BioE
description:
BioE is a story driven Fps. You wake up in an unfamiliar environment apparently lost all your memories, and you are armed with big guns of course, you have to figure out where you are and who you are.

Controls

WASD for movement

SHIFT to Sprint

SPACE to jump 

KEY C to crouch 

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to scope

SCROLL WHEEL or NUM 1 and 2 to switch weapons 

ESC to pause
